en.How do I add a new accommodation listing: How do I add a new accommodation listing?
en.How can I respond to booking inquiries?: How can I respond to booking inquiries?
en.How do I update an existing listing?: How do I update an existing listing?
en.Navigate to the 'Add Listing' tab and fi: Navigate to the 'Add Listing' tab and fill out the required information including property details, images, and pricing. Once all information is entered, click 'Submit'.
en.Go to the 'Inquiries' tab. Here you can: Go to the 'Inquiries' tab. Here you can view all booking inquiries and respond directly to the potential guests.
en.In the 'Manage Listings' tab, find the l: In the 'Manage Listings' tab, find the listing you wish to update. Click 'Edit' and make the necessary changes. Remember to save your updates.
en.Under the 'Bookings' tab, select the boo: Under the 'Bookings' tab, select the booking you wish to cancel. Click on 'Cancel Booking' and confirm the cancellation. The guest will be notified accordingly.
